headline: Eaton Unveils Next-generation Architecture to Advance 800 VDC Power Infrastructure for AI Factories
summary: CLEVELAND, October 13, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton today announced the delivery of a new reference architecture designed to accelerate the adoption of 800 VDC power in artificial intelligence (AI) data centers. Eaton’s new design, built in support of the 800 VDC architecture announced by NVIDIA, leverages Eaton’s innovative power management technology to protect and optimize high-density computing infrastructure and serves as a critical milestone in Eaton’s grid-to-chip stra

content.title: Eaton Unveils Next-generation Architecture to Advance 800 VDC Power Infrastructure for AI Factories
content.summary: CLEVELAND, October 13, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton today announced the delivery of a new reference architecture designed to accelerate the adoption of 800 VDC power in artificial intelligence (AI) data centers. Eaton’s new design, built in support of the 800 VDC architecture announced by NVIDIA, leverages Eaton’s innovative power management technology to protect and optimize high-density computing infrastructure and serves as a critical milestone in Eaton’s grid-to-chip stra

thumbnail.caption: Eaton’s new reference architecture is a key milestone in its collaboration with NVIDIA to accelerate 800 VDC power infrastructure in AI factories.
